The advanced Princeton Tec lens/collimator design is what gives you long, mid and short distance lighting with just one LED.

The Constant Brightness feature regulates the light intensity as long as the batteries have sufficient voltage.
Large switch cycles between the four modes - high, medium, low and blink.
Head tilts for optimum light angle.
Waterproof down to one meter.

Description:
The Photon Pant is a synthetic insulated trouser with Pertex® outer fabric and full length side zips
The Photon trouser is designed as an insulated trouser for extreme cold use or for use at rest stops when working hard.
Pertex® Microlight 30D outer fabric is water resistant and windproof whilst Primaloft® Eco insulation offers fantastic performance even when wet. Full length side zips mean the trousers are incredibly easy to get on and off for quick turn arounds at belays or at feed stops.
Ideal for use when mountaineering or for emergency use when mountain walking - also a good option for use in polar regions

Weight: 500g / 18oz

The Generator Jacket is a lightweight, synthetic filled jacket and is perfect as an insulated layering piece for backpacking, climbing and mountaineering. With minimal weight and pack size it is ideal for use at rest stops, belays and over-night camps.
The Generator Jacket uses PrimaLoft® ONE synthetic fill, 100g/m² in the body and 60g/m² in the arms.
PrimaLoft® ONE is the most water resistant and compressible of synthetic fills and the Pertex Quantum fabric is lightweight and very packable meaning you can always keep this jacket in your pack 'just-in-case'.
 
Sizes: S - XXL
Weight: 402g (Large)

Description:
The Momentum Jacket is a fully waterproof alpine mountain jacket made from lightweight 3 Layer eVent®.
The Momentum is the culmination of years making shell jackets for high level alpinists, forever asking for ever lighter equipment, the Momentum is a climbers shell designed for climbers making ascents in the pure alpine style.
The Momentum features napoleon pockets that are large and easy to access whilst climbing, a proper helmet compatible hood with great movement and visibility along with easy adjustability, water-resistant zips keep the wet out and adjustable velcro cuffs allow sleeves to be rolled up if required. Reflective detailing mean you shouldn't lose your climbing partner in the dark . . . unless you really want to. . .
These features also make the Momentum the ideal multisport jacket combing lightweight with functionality and a great active fit.
